name: Sonic Emerald
description:
The Evil Dr. Ivo Robotnik hasn't had enough of Sonic!! And this time, he's after the Chaos Emeralds Sonic and Tails burred on Emerald Island after the Floating Island incident and this time, he's not alone! His ultimate machine, Metal Sonic, returns better than ever and his hired treasure hunter named Fang the Sniper! And even worse, he kidnapped both his sidekick Miles "Tails" Prower, but also Amy Rose, Sonic's close friend from the Little Planet! 

To beat them his foes, Sonic will go into Sonic OVERDRIVE! Blast though the island at super sonic speed and collect the Chaos Emeralds to save the day!

Instructions: 

Left and Right: Movement

Space: Space Spin Attack

Down while running: Rolling 

Spin Dash: Down and Space Up or Down 

(Sky Chase Zone): Up and Down arrow keys 

Now go! Save Emerald Island!! Everyone's waiting for your help!
